channel.title: Jordiescape Version 4 Server / Client development team
channel.description:
Ok,i'm planning to release a client and a server,but i cannot do this my myself o.O . I'll need some help,i will [b]gladly[/b] accsept most people,but they need some experience at least. Here's an aplication you can fill out :)
[code][b]Age[/b]: [b]Job Wanted[/b]: [b]E-mail[i]: [b]Name[/b]: [b]Experience(Needed)[/b]: [b]Proof(Needed)[/b]: [b]Capabilities[/b]:[/code]
Ok,here are the [b]positions[/b]
[size=15pt][b][u]Server Coder[/u][/b][/size] -iceman327 - - -
[size=15pt][b][u]Client Coder/u][/b][/size] - -
[size=15pt][b][u]Server Admin[/u][/b][/size] -Zeb -Motoxnick -ham8legs
[size=15pt][b][u]Server Moderator[/u][/b][/size] - -
[size=15pt][b][u]Main Server Owner / Coder[/u][/b][/size] -Jordiescape
[size=15pt][b][u]Server Hoster (I cannot host,so this is important)[/u][/b][/size] -Amazing -[b](BACKUP)[/b]si force
[u][b]Thankyou![/b][/u] I appreciate any help in this project :) Thanks alot - Jordie
Edit : Add my msn for more help,this is my server development addy,my real addy is jord10846@hotmail.com,but my addy for the moment is jordan_cantrill@hotmail.co.uk
